title: A Self-Dual Model for the SU(2) Gauge Theory
abstract:
A model of SU(2) gauge theory in the space-time $R	imes S^3$ is constructed in terms of local gauge-invariant variables. A metric tensor $g_{\mu 
u}$ is defined starting with the components of the strength tensor $F_{\mu 
u}^k$ and of its dual $\widetilde{F}_{\mu 
u}^k$. It is shown that the components $g_{\mu 
u}$ determine the gauge field equations if some supplementary constraints are imposed. Two families of analitical solutions of the field equations are also obtained.
